attributes.additional_details: There is sufficient existing evidence vai various sources to support a NO Deal.   The EU have already claimed that the existing deal is the only one, therefore with that deal being unacceptable, it's time to petition the Government to a NO Deal and leave.   Any money that was due to EU as a divorce would be offset to steer the UK, whilst a WTO or alternative deal was agreed upon or not
attributes.background: This petition is supporting a NO Deal and no divorce payment to the EU on or after the 29th March 2019.
